page.title: 07EDUCATION.
page.content:
A TYPICAL FRIDAY IN HARLESTONE SCHOOL.
At 8.55 the bell rings to start lessons.After registration the children are given a test on tables and spellings for half an hour.After the test,they are given the spellings to learn for the coming week and some language work.Playtime is from 10.30 to 10.45.There is one playground for all the children.Until lunch time at 12.00p.m. they do Maths.being split into four groups.Lunch time ends at 1.00p.m.There is half an hours Topic work before preparations are made for Assembly which is usually taken by the Head.Afternoon playtime is from 2.30 to 2.45.At 3.00 there is the Assembly to which parents are invited.The home bell rings at 3.30.
